resources.string: Private keys never leave your device
Private keys never leave your device
I understand that if I lose my recovery word, I will not be able to access my wallet
Never share recovery phrase with anyone,store it securely!
You can watch any public address without divulging your private key. This lets you view balance and transactions, but not send transactions

BossPal - is a non-custodian crypto wallet, that enable user to securely store, swap, earn and win crypto (Popular Coin, BEP20 Token and ERC20 Token). BossPal is developed and owned by Tajiri Global Team.
